about_the_game: Orc armies invaded the human world through portals, and their large numbers and superior ability to adapt to the environment pose a huge threat to humans. The heroes of humanity took up arms to protect their homeland against alien invaders.This is a top-down shooting action game，Players have to collect guns and ammunition supplies to deal with enemies, while paying attention to positioning, which has high damage.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violent and gore content

detailed_description: Orc armies invaded the human world through portals, and their large numbers and superior ability to adapt to the environment pose a huge threat to humans. The heroes of humanity took up arms to protect their homeland against alien invaders.This is a top-down shooting action game，Players have to collect guns and ammunition supplies to deal with enemies, while paying attention to positioning, which has high damage.

name: Orc killer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 470 1GB / AMD HD 5800 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio
  • VR Support: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC
  • VR Support: no

short_description: This is a third-person top-down shooter where the mysterious map search and well-designed monsters and weapon blows give players a different experience.
